name: What Lurks Above
description:
"You cant keep your enemies any closer than this"

What Lurks Above is a psychological narrative experience where you play as Vanessa, a girl who struggles with depression and the never-ending battle with the voice inside her head telling her shes not good enough.  

Explore the mind and reality of someone struggling with that constant voice trying to bring them down and ruin their day-to-day life in a captivating enviorment and story that keeps you wondering what will happen next. 

Follow us on Facebook, Youtube and our Homepage for more updates and information!
